subSubSection.paragraph:

,

, in
Thalassia
meadows,
3 m .
Type material: MNCN 16.01/ 11018 (HT), USNM 1102753 (PT). Records: Only known for the type locality.

Megalomma perkinsi

: 43
–45, Fig. 11 . Type locality: Florida, Cape Lookout, intertidal sand mixed with gravel and shell fragments. Type material: USNM 53976 (HT).

subSubSection.paragraph: Records: Only known for the type locality.
